name: haram
content:

not allowed according to Islamic law: He is of the opinion that it is haram to smoke, buy, or sell tobacco. Some Muslims believe musical instruments are haram. They avoid investments in haraam sectors like alcohol, gambling, and pornography. Opposite
halal
More examplesFewer examplesTaking opiates is haram, or forbidden, in Islam.Some activities considered to be "haram" in Islam are also forbidden by other religions, such as taking drugs.Is it haram to listen to music during Ramadan?I try to ensure that the companies I invest in do not involve themselves in the selling of haraam products.
